Blast Shield.name: Blast Shield
Blast Shield.blurb: Vi charges a shield over time. The shield can be activated by hitting an enemy with an ability.
Blast Shield.description: Innate: Hitting an enemy with an ability grants Vi a  15% maximum health shield for up to 3 seconds.
Blast Shield.description2: Blast Shield's cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds for every trigger of  Denting Blows.
Blast Shield.notes: * Triggering  Denting Blows will not activate Blast Shield.

Vault Breaker.name: Vault Breaker
Vault Breaker.blurb: Vi charges her gauntlets and unleashes a vault shattering punch, carrying her forward. Enemies she hits are knocked back and receive a stack of Denting Blows.
Vault Breaker.description: First Cast: Vi  charges for up to 4 seconds to increase Vault Breaker's  range, speed, and damage over 1.25 seconds. While charging, Vi is  pacified and  slowed by 15%.
Vault Breaker.description2: Second Cast: Vi  dashes in the target direction, dealing  physical damage to all enemies she passes through, increased by 0% − 100% (based on channel time).
Vault Breaker.leveling2:
Minimum Physical Damage:
55 / 80 / 105 / 130 / 155 (+ 70% bonus AD)
Maximum Damage:
110 / 160 / 210 / 260 / 310 (+ 140% bonus AD)
Vault Breaker.description3: Vi stops upon colliding with an enemy champion,  knocking them back while other units are instead  pulled towards her.
Vault Breaker.description4: Vault Breaker will go on a 3 second cooldown and refund  50% of its mana cost if Vi is interrupted during the channeling.
Vault Breaker.notes:
* Despite being  pacified, Vi can still  Flash (and cast all other summoner spells except  Teleport) during Vault Breaker's channel.
 Vi can reduce Vault Breaker's  slow with slow resist but cannot remove/reduce it with  Cleanse.
  Spell shield will block the damage (will not prevent  Denting Blows' application).

Denting Blows.name: Denting Blows
Denting Blows.blurb: Vi's punches break her opponent's Armor, dealing bonus damage and granting her Attack Speed.
Denting Blows.description: Passive: Vi's basic attacks and  Vault Breaker apply Denting Blows to enemies hit, stacking up to 3 times. At 3 Denting Blows, Vi consumes them to deal bonus physical damage, capped at 300 against non-champions.
Denting Blows.leveling:
Bonus Physical Damage:
4 / 5.5 / 7 / 8.5 / 10% (+  1% per 35    2.86% per 100  bonus AD) of target's maximum health
Denting Blows.description2: For the next 4 seconds, Vi gains  bonus attack speed and the target has 20% reduced armor.
Denting Blows.notes:
* Denting Blows stacks will not reset when Vi switches targets.
 Denting Blows bonus attack speed will not stack with itself when Vi gains Denting Blows bonuses from the same target repeatedly or from multiple enemies in quick succession.
 The enhanced attack applies other on-hit effects and can both  critically strike as normal as well as apply  life steal (the bonus damage cannot do either) but does not affect structures.
 Denting Blows can be  blocked but cannot be  dodged or negated if Vi is  blinded.

Excessive Force.name: Excessive Force
Excessive Force.blurb: Vi's next attack blasts through her target, dealing damage to enemies behind it.
Excessive Force.description: Passive: Vi periodically stores up to 2 Excessive Force charges.
Excessive Force.description2: Active: Vi's next basic attack gains  50 bonus range and deals physical damage to all enemies in a cone in front of her. The damage can  critically strike for (100% +  25%) AD bonus physical damage.
Excessive Force.description3: Excessive Force resets Vi's basic attack timer.
Excessive Force.notes:
* Excessive Force has no cast time and does not interrupt Vi's previous orders.
  Denting Blows will only apply a stack on Excessive Force's primary target (does not interact with the cone's damage).
 The enhanced attack applies other on-hit effects, can  critically strike as normal (the cone damage will also crit), apply  life steal, and affect structures if they are the primary target (the cone's damage does not affect them).
 Excessive Force can be  dodged,  blocked or miss if Vi is  blinded.
 Secondary targets will still be damaged.

  Spell shield will block the ability (or the cone's damage when hitting a secondary target).

Assault and Battery.name: Assault and Battery
Assault and Battery.blurb: Vi runs down an enemy, knocking aside anyone in the way. When she reaches her target she knocks it into the air, jumps after it, and slams it back into the ground.
Assault and Battery.description: Active: Vi rushes  unstoppably to the target enemy champion, dealing physical damage upon arrival and  knocking them up for 1.25 seconds.
Assault and Battery.description2: Enemies along the way are  knocked aside by 350 units for 0.75 seconds and dealt the same damage.
Assault and Battery.notes:
* Assault and Battery has a maximum tether range.
  Untargetability prevents Vi from affecting the target, but does not stop her dash.
